feed.title: PsiTransfer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PsiTransfer: v2.1.0
entry.content:
• Use GitHub Actions for building and publishing
  • Renew Docker image
  • Multi-Arch Docker images
  • Add Images to Github-Container-Registry
  • Server-side password handling
  • dark theme
  • Update app dependencies
  • Add/Update translations:
  • japanese
  • dutch
  • polish
  • russian
  • swedish
  • spanish
  • Fix: tar.gz download consumes much memory

Full Changelog: https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer/compare/v2.0.1...v2.1.0

docker pull ghcr.io/psi-4ward/psitransfer:v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for PsiTransfer: v2.1.1
entry.content: • Fix: no access-denied message on wrong password

entry.title: New release for PsiTransfer: v2.2.0
entry.content:
• 0014d81 Lock the bucket when the files upload completes

  • b9853c9 Restrict upload to a file which upload completed already

  • pl.js typo fix by @Mudzay in https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer/pull/285

  • Update de.js by @AlkoholLiga in https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer/pull/290
  • Disable QR code by @AlkoholLiga in https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer/pull/291
  • Create tr.js by @goredhell in https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer/pull/293

Full Changelog: https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer/compare/v2.1.2...v2.2.0

entry.title: New release for PsiTransfer: v2.3.0
entry.content:
• Updated some translations
  • Add Reverse proxy support
  • Add some improvements for disabled people like tab-selection
  • Update dependencies
